Key Match Events: Igor Jesus scored an equalizer in the 43rd minute with an headed effort from Savinho's cross
Luiz Henrique scored the 89th-minute winner with a low-driven shot from outside the box
Pre-Game Insights: Brazil was missing key players like Vinicius Junior, impacting their performance
Dorival Junior's tactics were criticized as the team struggled with possession and creativity
Post-Match Reflections: Dorival Junior's managerial performance was questioned despite the win
The match result moved Brazil up in the World Cup qualification table
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Estadio Nacional Julio Martinez Pradanos
Gabriel Martinelli and Endrick were introduced as late substitutes
